participant_1.background:

I have a lot of flexibility in my work schedule, which allows me to go to dance lessons with my boyfriend and recycle more.
I love to edit videos and spend time with my pug on rainy days.
I think it's important to be prepared for any situation, and that includes knowing how to defend yourself.

content.text: Hello! I'm glad to meet you.
Nice to meet you too! I'm doing well, how are you?
I'm doing great, thanks! What do you like to do for fun?
I enjoy listening to jazz music and dancing. I also enjoy writing and reading.
What kind of things do you like to write about?
I love writing about my favorite movies and actors. I've even written a biography of my favorite actor.
That's really cool! Do you have any other hobbies?
Yes, I love to cook and bake. I also enjoy riding horses.
Those are all great hobbies! I love to cook too.
What's your favorite thing to cook?
I love making pasta dishes. I love making my own pasta.
That sounds delicious! I've never made my own pasta before.
It's really easy! You just need flour, eggs, and water.
I might have to try that sometime.
